Package it.polimi.ingsw.GUI

Class PlayingStageController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.GUI.PlayingStageController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class PlayingStageController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for the PlayingStage.fxml stage. The Client in this stage is playing a Game.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void handleAction​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
    When the Player click over a MenuButton of the GridPane this method will 'save' the coordinates where x is the row and y the column (according to the conventions used by Board).
    static void handleCardChoice​(God selected)
    Based on the player's God it handle the GodObject (bottom left).
    static void handleChatUpdate​(ChatUpdateMessage msg)
    Updates the chat TextArea adding a new String to the ObservableList list messages.
    static void handleException​(InvalidChoiceMessage message)
    Updates the chat TextArea adding a new red String to the ObservableList list messages which is the InvalidChoiceMessage message.
    void handleMouseExit​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
    Dual of the handleMouseOver method.
    void handleMouseOver​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
    Increase the opacity of the MenuButton to let the player knows where is the cursor over the board pane.
    private void handleSend()
    Used to notify a new PlayerChatMessage.
    void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
    Initialize various components of the graphical interface.
    static void setActionLabel​(java.util.ArrayList<Actions> act)
    The ObservableList list will be cleared and it will be filled with the possible Actions for the Player.
    static void setMainController​(MainController mc)  
    static void setTurnPlayer​(java.lang.String name, Color player, God god)
    Method that set the top Image that represents the Player that has the current turn.

  • Method Details

    • setMainController

      public static void setMainController​(MainController mc)

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initialize various components of the graphical interface. The board is a 5x5 GridPane which each cell contains ImageView fro buildings or domes and pawns. Each cell has a MenuButton that is filled with MenuItem of the possible actions for the Player.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url -
      resourceBundle -

    • setTurnPlayer

      public static void setTurnPlayer​(java.lang.String name, Color player, God god)
      Method that set the top Image that represents the Player that has the current turn. It change the name, the color and the god image.
      Parameters:
      name -
      player -
      god -

    • setActionLabel

      public static void setActionLabel​(java.util.ArrayList<Actions> act)
      The ObservableList list will be cleared and it will be filled with the possible Actions for the Player.
      Parameters:
      act -

    • handleAction

      public void handleAction​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
      When the Player click over a MenuButton of the GridPane this method will 'save' the coordinates where x is the row and y the column (according to the conventions used by Board).
      Parameters:
      e -

    • handleMouseOver

      public void handleMouseOver​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
      Increase the opacity of the MenuButton to let the player knows where is the cursor over the board pane.
      Parameters:
      e -

    • handleMouseExit

      public void handleMouseExit​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
      Dual of the handleMouseOver method. When the cursor exit the cell the opacity will be re-setted to the default value which is zero.
      Parameters:
      e -

    • updateBoard

      public static void updateBoard()
      When the ClientBoard the MainController is notified and this method will update the board view.

    • handleSend

      private void handleSend()
      Used to notify a new PlayerChatMessage. Triggered by a MouseEvent over the send message Button near the chatText TextField.

    • handleChatUpdate

      public static void handleChatUpdate​(ChatUpdateMessage msg)
      Updates the chat TextArea adding a new String to the ObservableList list messages.
      Parameters:
      msg -

    • handleException

      public static void handleException​(InvalidChoiceMessage message)
      Updates the chat TextArea adding a new red String to the ObservableList list messages which is the InvalidChoiceMessage message.
